title: Teslaâ€™s Car-Karaoke Mic in China Sells Out on First Day
sub_head: EV maker introduces TeslaMic as it tries to catch up to local rivals in carpool karaoke
body:
Chinese consumers on Friday gave an ovation to Tesla Inc., a new seller of karaoke microphones for singing in cars.
The Austin, Texas, company ran out of the TeslaMic less than an hour after it started offering the wireless product for $188 a pair on its official Chinese website.
